statements: DELETE FROM nanotechnology_projects WHERE project_name = 'Quantum Computing Project';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Example Project';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Sample Project' AND lead_researcher = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM collaborators WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM project_collaborators WHERE collaborator_id = 'f52eb29e-6ac1-4489-aa65-cb44e492c627' AND project_id = 'aaaca27a-772c-4b69-9107-77d627d809f9';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE researcher_specialty = 'Data Science';
DELETE FROM collaborations WHERE project_id = 201 AND researcher_id = 301 AND collaboration_status = 'Active';
